views.markdown:
Improved the support for ios 12 1. Added iOS 11 Support
2. Fixed some bugs
1. Fixed the logging issues
2. Added an iKeyMonitor icon on the home screen which can be removed without removing the app
3. Added logging of WeChat text messages
4. Voice recording can be turned off remotely now
1. Fixed some bugs
2. Added surrounding recording
Added support for iOS 10 1. Improved Snapchat screenshots capturing
2. Added Clipboard logging
3. Fixed Facebook logging and QQ crashing issue
4. Added surround recording
1. Temporarily disabled the monitoring of voice/video calls to eliminate effects on normal voice/video calls.
2. Fixed the bug of repeated Skype text records.
1. Improved log uploading


1. Fixed chat logging issue
2. Supported Voice Message Logging
1. New App blocker to block unwanted Apps or Games.
2. Time Limit for children to block Apps in bedtime, homework time.
1. Fixed some bugs.
2. Supported logging of Contacts/Notes/Calendars/Reminders/Voice Memos.
1. Added "Capture Screenshots on Touch Actions" option in iKeyMonitor Settings - Advance Settings
2. Fixed the failure of reading history in Kik, Line, Hangouts latest version. (kik version:9.2.1, hangouts version 7.0.0, Line version 5.9.5)
3. Fixed the repeated screenshots issue on iOS 5
4. Supported monitoring of Notes, Reminders and Contacts(Send by Email).
1. Capture screenshots for specific App by alert words on touch actions

1. Capture screenshots for Mail, Snapchat, Instagram, QQ, Wechat
2. Capture screenshots on touch actions
Improved iOS 9 support 1. Improved iOS 9 support
2. Improved screenshots capturing by app name
Minor bug fix

1. Fixed a bug of FTP failure when password contains @ # % ^.
2. Improved keystrokes log, removed some duplicate entries.
3. Fixed a crash when unlocking the device.
Added logging of sent and received messages of Kik, Skype, Line.

1. Logs can be uploaded to online account
2. Remote license upgrade/renew
3. Remote configuration

1. Added the multi-language support in iKeyMonitor interface, including English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Hindi, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.
2. Added Web Portal support for remote monitoring turn-on and turn-off.
3. Changed the format of the Web History logs received in emails to attachments
